sentences.sentence: The sun baked down on the concrete, unrelieved by any breeze.
sentences.translation: 太阳炙烤着水泥，清风并不能降低热度。

sentences.sentence: You may even realize, “I have to let go of unrelieved anger to have any space for love to grow.
sentences.translation: 你可能还会觉得：“我必须摒弃那些对你未减轻的怒火，这样我们之间的爱才有可能变得更浓。”
